text: Stephen Bennett Manuck (born December 3, 1948) is an American psychologist who is Distinguished Professor in the Department of Psychology at the University of Pittsburgh. ==References== ==External links== *Faculty page * Category:Living people Category:1948 births Category:American psychologists Category:People from San Francisco Category:University of California, Davis alumni Category:Vanderbilt University alumni Category:University of Pittsburgh faculty Category:University of Virginia faculty Category:Wake Forest University faculty
title: Stephen Manuck
